basic.description:
{Basic Nimbleness}

Nimbleness allows your unit to Partially avoid an enemy attack, reducing his attack by 5%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Nimbleness

Nimbleness allows your unit to Partially avoid an enemy attack, reducing his attack by 10%.

expert.description:
{Expert Nimbleness}

Nimbleness allows your unit to Partially avoid an enemy attack, reducing his attack by 15%.
